content.text: Match ends, Barcelona B 2, Mallorca 4.
Second Half ends, Barcelona B 2, Mallorca 4.
Goal!  Barcelona B 2, Mallorca 4. Marco Asensio (Mallorca) from a free kick with a left footed shot to the top right corner.
Foul by Bagnack (Barcelona B).
Xisco (Mallorca) wins a free kick on the right wing.
